normalized: i had snuck into the girls' dormitory.
paying careful attention, i headed for rinko-nee's room.
as i imagined, the flow of people going in and out was heavy at this time.
i had almost gotten caught a few times, but i evaded that by making free use of my wind escape, and nearly an hour had passed by the time i finally arrived in front of her room.

name: tatsurou
normalized: （rinko-nee…!
while being cautious of my surroundings, i knocked on the door.
once at the beginning, then after a brief moment, three times quickly.
that was the signal for “it's me,” which we had decided on for times like this.
but there was no response.
i gave the signal once more, in the same way.
like before, no response.
yet there was someone inside.
i sensed that with my wind escape.

name: tatsurou
normalized: rinko-nee, it's me!
i called out to rinko-nee, while controlling the air so that my voice would only reach into this room.
even so, the door didn't open.

name: tatsurou
normalized: （what's wrong, rinko-nee?
can you not come out?
did something happen?
i examined the door.
it wasn't locked.

name: tatsurou
normalized: （there's nothing for it but to go in.
i had to be quick here, as i would fail if someone came out of any of the rooms.
i laid my hand on the knob, and was about to open it, when
come in.
it's unlocked.
a voice came from inside.
it was the voice of that kuroi.

name: tatsurou
normalized: （he's in rinko-nee's room!
this meant that that hadn't been me mis-seeing or misunderstanding anything earlier.
it had looked like they had entered the building at the same time by coincidence, because he had something else to take care of.
because there was a caretaker's room in the girls' dorm, for example.
that kind of wishful thinking had fruitlessly died out.
that bastard had gone into this room, accompanied by rinko-nee.

name: kuroi
normalized: can't you hear?
i'm in the middle of something right now.
if you have business with your big sister, come in.
you were her little brother, tatsurou-kun, if i remember rightly?

name: tatsurou
normalized: （kuh…!
even being called by name, i turned the knob that i was clutching, while holding back from wanting to kick the door down in irritation.

name: tatsurou
normalized: rinko-nee…?
as soon as i set foot in the room, i promptly swept my eyes across it.
she wasn't there.
the only one there was kuroi.
he was standing around by himself, on the other side of the living room counter table.

name: kuroi
normalized: sorry, but she's out.

name: tatsurou
normalized: eh?

name: kuroi
normalized: rinko's not here.
if you have business with her, i'll listen to it.
kuroi said, then took his smartphone out from his pocket and started fiddling with it like he didn't care about me.
my impression from when i first met him remained intact.
he was a man who was the very picture of arrogance.
i knew at a glance that he was looking down on me, the general course student.
out?
in that case, what was this guy doing in rinko-nee's room?
where was rinko-nee?

name: tatsurou
normalized: um…
although i didn't want to talk to him, i began to address kuroi.

name: kuroi
normalized: what?
kuroi shifted his gaze from his smartphone to me.

name: tatsurou
normalized: where's rinko-nee…?

name: kuroi
normalized: hmm, i dunno.
kuroi answered, like he didn't care.

name: tatsurou
normalized: that can't be.
i saw rinko-nee enter the girls' dorm with you.

name: kuroi
normalized: ho…

name: tatsurou
normalized: where's rinko-nee?
why are you in rinko-nee's room?
kuroi's sneering smile grew deeper, and my voice unintentionally became rougher.

name: kuroi
normalized: rinko is my maid.
a master is free to enter his maid's room.
where is rinko?
well, she certainly is around, that's true…

name: tatsurou
normalized: （you asshole!
he was clearly mocking me, and i had started wanting to tear that disgusting face to shreds with my wind, but i held myself back by force.

name: tatsurou
normalized: fine.
i'll look for her myself.
rinko-nee!
i tried to go inside, when
zuru!

name: tatsurou
normalized: uwah!
thump!
all of a sudden, i lost my footing and fell over.
when i looked, the corridor was soaked.

name: kuroi
normalized: hahaha, sorry.
i spilled some water earlier.
kuroi's sneering reached my ear.
a blunder unbecoming of a taimanin.
and moreover, in front of a guy like this.

name: tatsurou
normalized: kuh!

name: kuroi
normalized: wait.
i stood up, gritting my teeth, and was about to enter the living room when kuroi sharply called out to me.

name: tatsurou
normalized: what?!

name: kuroi
normalized: this is an area that's off limits to general course students.
you can't say you didn't know, can you?

name: kuroi
normalized: and to even go into the girls' dormitory… do you understand?
if i were to report this to the school, you would definitely get expelled.

name: tatsurou
normalized: th, that's…
i came to my senses due to kuroi's threat.
if scholarship students could freely enter their maids' rooms, that meant it was only me who had broken the rules.
was that why kuroi invited me in?
had i been set up?!
did he hate me so much that he wanted to get me expelled, after having met him just once yesterday?
well, that was mutual.
come to think of it, i had heard, although the reason wasn't clear, that the maid course student who had been partners with kuroi before rinko-nee had left school.

since he had a blood relationship with the headmaster of this place, washizu shigeru, whom we recognized as the enemy ringleader, i had certainly figured they would be badgers of the same burrow, but to be this crafty…

name: tatsurou
normalized: （kuh… what do i do…?
preferably, i would deal with him here, and even if he died, i would somehow dispose of him in such a way that i wouldn't be discovered.
i had considered that much.

name: kuroi
normalized: listen up.
wait right there.
if you follow my instructions, i won't report this to the school.
you got it, right?
kuroi said, with the soft voice characteristic of a person who had absolute power over someone.

name: tatsurou
normalized: …understood.
would it be better to obey at this point?
killing him would be bad right now.
at the end of the day, he was washizu's relative.
we couldn't afford to have the enemy harbour too much vigilance.

name: tatsurou
normalized: um, about my sister…
i shelved the matter of myself for the time being, and asked about my biggest concern.

name: kuroi
normalized: yeah, rinko's gonna be back pretty soon.

name: tatsurou
normalized: where did my sister go in the first place?

name: kuroi
normalized: she'll be back once i've come.

name: tatsurou
normalized: come?

name: kuroi
normalized: yeah, try looking at the door.
not the living room door.
the front door.
kuroi jerked his chin at the one behind me, still making a faint smile.
i turned around, as i was told.
there was just a door there.

name: tatsurou
normalized: is there something on the door…?

name: kuroi
normalized: try looking carefully.

name: tatsurou
normalized: looking carefully?

name: kuroi
normalized: that's right.
look carefully, and you'll find something has relations with rinko.
i didn't get it at all.
it was just a completely ordinary door.
where were the relations to rinko-nee in this?

name: tatsurou
normalized: is my sister coming from outside?

name: kuroi
normalized: yeah, i think she's going to come real soon.

name: tatsurou
normalized: eh?
the next moment――
i felt like i had heard rinko-nee's voice.
not from the direction of the door i was being told to look at.
from behind me―in other words, the direction where kuroi was.

name: tatsurou
normalized: rinko-nee?!
i looked back and raised my voice.

name: tatsurou
normalized: is rinko-nee over there?!

name: kuroi
normalized: mm?
what?
mm, fuuh… what's the matter, tatsurou-kun?
kuroi looked in my direction, with a face like he had just now noticed me for the first time.

name: tatsurou
normalized: are, are you making fun of me…?!
i asked, although i didn't even need to check that.
my voice shook with anger.

name: kuroi
normalized: i'm not making fun.
i wouldn't do such a thing to my dear rinko's little brother.

name: tatsurou
normalized: you really are mocking me, aren't you?!

name: kuroi
normalized: that's not true.
you misunderstand.
kuroi was smirking.

name: tatsurou
normalized: （this guy…）
i began seriously wanting to kill him.
i didn't want to let a guy like this be at rinko-nee's side even a second longer.

name: kuroi
normalized: i get it.
don't be so angry.
kuroi said, making an extremely flippant smile.

name: kuroi
normalized: your precious rinko is right here, tatsurou-kun.

name: kuroi
normalized: all right, rinko, stand up.
kuroi ordered, facing the floor.

name: kuroi
normalized: take care of your appearance.
don't embarrass me, your master.

name: rinko
normalized: yes…
i heard rinko-nee's voice answer.

name: tatsurou
normalized: appearance?

name: kuroi
normalized: a maid must always appear maid-like.
i don't like untidy maids.
well, i guess that wouldn't be understood by a guy who gets delighted just from the outfit, thinking “a maid, a maid!
for some reason, kuroi was prattling on at his leisure.
and then, after about 30 seconds had passed――

name: rinko
normalized: …i apologize for having kept you waiting.
rinko-nee appeared right next to kuroi, from a place that hadn't been visible because of the counter.

name: tatsurou
normalized: rinko-nee?!
why had she been hiding in a place like that?
it was like she had been on her hands and knees on the floor until now, wasn't it?
rinko-nee didn't even try to look at my face.
she was just standing there, as if to hide behind kuroi.

name: tatsurou
normalized: rinko-nee, what were you doing?

name: kuroi
normalized: the water that made tatsurou-kun fall over.
that annoying water spilled over here too, see, and i was making rinko wipe it up.
rinko-nee didn't answer, and kuroi explained in her stead.

name: tatsurou
normalized: huh?
then why didn't you answer even once all this time?

name: kuroi
normalized: well, i doubt the likes of you would understand.
kuroi said, with eyes that seemed like he was looking at a person stupider than himself―no, at a monkey or something.

name: kuroi
normalized: a master's orders are absolute.
there's no way she could so much as whisper in the middle of a job given by her master, is there?
even if her little brother is prepared to defy school regulations and get expelled to come see his sister.

name: tatsurou
normalized: kuh…
“a master's orders are absolute.
“no whispering in the middle of a job.
how dare he go that far with rinko-nee, when they were nothing more than partners assigned by the school?

name: kuroi
normalized: oh, well.
you're still in the middle of work, but that's all right, rinko.
i'll allow you a conversation with tatsurou-kun.
rinko-nee then looked at me for the first time.

name: tatsurou
normalized: （uuh…）
my breathing stopped.
those eyes.
they were eyes that were trying to suppress all emotion and carry out her mission.

name: rinko
normalized: tatsurou, what do you think will happen if you get expelled?!

name: tatsurou
normalized: that's…
obviously, that would mean the failure of the mission.
all our efforts up to now would come to nothing.
we would become unable to find out about the chips that had been implanted in rinko-nee and yukikaze, too.
that was why rinko-nee was obediently following the things that a guy like this told her.
single-mindedly enduring them, like a taimanin.

name: tatsurou
normalized: （and yet, i――）
on top of having taken the unnecessary risk to sneak into the girls' dorm on the spur of the moment,
i had been caught by the worst person to be discovered by, and had even been about to kill him out of personal hatred.

name: tatsurou
normalized: （i'm unfit to be a taimanin…）

name: rinko
normalized: i will ask you myself, for goshujin-sama.
go back to your own dorm quickly!

name: tatsurou
normalized: r, rinko-nee… i…

name: rinko
normalized: i'm saying, get out, quickly!
rinko-nee shouted at me.
and then, she averted her eyes like she didn't even want to see my face anymore.

name: tatsurou
normalized: …sorry, rinko-nee.

name: kuroi
normalized: hold on, tatsurou-kun.
i hung my head, and was about to leave when kuroi called me to a halt.

name: kuroi
normalized: if you're discovered by anyone when you leave here, you'll be expelled for sure.
so i'll go with you.
if i take you with me, there'll be no problem.

name: kuroi
normalized: naturally, i'll get some kind of punishment, but it will be far lighter than tatsurou-kun getting expelled.

name: rinko
normalized: thank you very much, goshujin-sama!
rinko-nee was bowing deeply enough for her forehead to touch the floor due to kuroi's assistance.

name: tatsurou
normalized: （arrgh, because of me…!
i had made rinko-nee, who was prouder than anyone, do something like this.
because i had been driven by a worthless rumour.
what a stupid action i had taken.

name: kuroi
normalized: i don't mind.
it's for your little brother.
well, shall we go?

name: tatsurou
normalized: yes, thank you.
i bowed deeply.
suppressing my petty emotions, like rinko-nee.
